description: The labels needed for ui elements in the hermes designer

tabs.standard.label.description: The label for the standard inks selection tab

tabs.metallic.label.description: The label for the metallic inks selection tab

selectedInk.label.description: The label used to display the current selected ink. Can utilize $currentInk variable

imageColors.label.description: The label used when presenting the current colors of the image

download.description.description: The text used as the description for downloading the address template
download.description.default: Download our template spreadsheet and enter your desired addresses in the columns provided.

download.button.label.description: The label used for the download template button

download.button.icon.description: The icon used for the download template button

upload.description.description: The text used as the description for uploading the address template
upload.description.default: Upload your completed spreadsheet here to add your addresses.

upload.button.label.description: The label used for the upload addresses button

upload.button.icon.description: The icon used for the upload addresses button

upload.success.label.description: The label used after addresses uploaded successfully, can use the $fileName variable

upload.success.icon.description: The icon used with the success label

upload.error.label.description: The label if the address upload failed, can use the $fileName variable

upload.error.icon.description: The icon used with the error label

addressPreview.label.description: The label for the address preview input

menubar.undo.label.description: The label showed with the undo button on the menu bar

menubar.undo.icon.description: The icon showed with the undo button on the menu bar

menubar.redo.label.description: The label showed with the redo button on the menu bar

menubar.redo.icon.description: The icon showed with the redo button on the menu bar

menubar.saveStatus.none.label.description: The label showed when there is nothing to save on the menu bar

menubar.saveStatus.none.icon.description: The icon showed when there is nothing to save on the menu bar

menubar.saveStatus.progress.label.description: The label showed when saving is in progress on the menu bar

menubar.saveStatus.progress.icon.description: The icon showed when saving is in progress on the menu bar

menubar.saveStatus.success.label.description: The label showed when saving is complete on the menu bar

menubar.saveStatus.success.icon.description: The icon showed when saving is complete on the menu bar

menubar.printPreview.label.description: The label showed with the printPreview button on the menu bar

menubar.printPreview.icon.description: The icon showed with the printPreview button on the menu bar

menubar.downloadProof.label.description: The label showed with the downloadProof button on the menu bar

menubar.downloadProof.icon.description: The icon showed with the downloadProof button on the menu bar

menubar.pricingLabel.icon.description: The label showed on the menu bar pricing dropdown. This label can include $unitPrice and $totalPrice variable usage.

menubar.nextButton.label.description: The label used in the button to proceed to the next steps

workspace.toolBar.stack.returnAddress.la.description: The label used for the return address tool in the tool bar

workspace.toolBar.stack.returnAddress.ic.description: The icon used for the return address tool in the tool bar

workspace.toolBar.tab.returnAddress.labe.description: The return address.toolBar tab top title text

workspace.toolBar.tab.returnAddress.posi.description: The return address postition selector label text
The return address front postition option label text
The return address front postition option label text

workspace.toolBar.tab.returnAddress.addr.description: The return address mailing address input label
The return address mailing address placeholder text

workspace.toolBar.tab.returnAddress.colo.description: The return address color input label

workspace.toolBar.stack.mailingAddress.l.description: The label used for the Mailing Address tool in the.toolBar

workspace.toolBar.stack.mailingAddress.i.description: The icon used for the Mailing Address tool in the.toolBar

workspace.toolBar.tab.mailingAddress.lab.description: The mailing address address.toolBar tab top title text

workspace.toolBar.tab.mailingAddress.typ.description: The label for the address type input
The label for the single address input option
The label for the multiple address input option

workspace.toolBar.tab.mailingAddress.mul.description: The label for the multiple address component

workspace.toolBar.tab.mailingAddress.add.description: The mailing address address input label
The return address mailing address placeholder text

workspace.toolBar.tab.mailingAdress.colo.description: The return address color input label

workspace.toolBar.stack.image.label.description: The label used for the Image tool in the.toolBar

workspace.toolBar.stack.image.icon.description: The icon used for the Image tool in the.toolBar

workspace.toolBar.tab.image.label.description: The title for the image tool tab

workspace.toolBar.tab.image.upload.butto.description: The label used for the image upload button
The icon used with the image upload label

workspace.toolBar.tab.image.gallery.labe.description: The text label used for the image gallery section

workspace.toolBar.tab.image.gallery.dele.description: The text label for the delete image button in the image gallery
The icon used for the delete image button

workspace.canvasSpace.widgets.floatingPa.description: The label used for the front page selection option
The label used for the back page selection option

workspace.canvasSpace.widgets.floatingTo.description: The label used for the safety line floating tooltip
The hover text for the safety line tooltip
workspace.canvasSpace.widgets.floatingTo.default: Keep text and important elements inside this line to prevent them from being cut off.

workspace.canvasSpace.widgets.floatingTo.description: The label used for the cut line floating tooltip
The hover text for the cut line tooltip
workspace.canvasSpace.widgets.floatingTo.default: The line where this product is cut at. Extend background art slightly past this line if you want full coverage

workspace.canvasSpace.widgets.floatingTo.description: The label used for the bleed line floating tooltip
The hover text for the bleed line tooltip
workspace.canvasSpace.widgets.floatingTo.default: Extend background colors or images to this line to avoid white edges.

modal.printPreview.label.description: The title for the print preview modal

modal.printPreview.description.label.description: The text for the print preview description
modal.printPreview.description.label.default: Printed colors can appear slightly different depending on the color or material you're printing on. We've adjusted the colors in your image to reflect how they're likely to look once printed

modal.printPreview.pageSelector.front.la.description: The label used for the front page selection option

modal.printPreview.pageSelector.back.lab.description: The label used for the back page selection option

adder.foil_coverage_sm.label.description: The ui label for the foil coverage small adder

adder.foil_coverage_std.label.description: The ui label for the foil coverage standard adder

adder.foil_coverage_lg.label.description: The ui label for the foil coverage large adder

adder.foil_coverage_xl.label.description: The ui label for the foil coverage extra-large adder

adder.foil_stamp_1.label.description: The ui label for a single foil impression

adder.foil_stamp_2.label.description: The ui label for two foil impressions

adder.foil_stamp_3.label.description: The ui label for three foil impressions

adder.foil_stamp_4.label.description: The ui label for four foil impressions

adder.foil_stamp_5.label.description: The ui label for five foil impressions

adder.color_side1_blk_std.label.description: Label for 1 Black and 1 Standard ink

adder.color_side1_blk_pms.label.description: Label for 1 Black and 1 Custom PMS ink

adder.color_side1_std_pms.label.description: Label for 1 Standard and 1 Custom PMS ink

adder.color_side1_blk_2std.label.description: Label for 2 Standard inks and 1 Black ink

adder.color_side1_blk_std_pms.label.description: Label for 1 Black, 1 Standard, and 1 Custom PMS ink
adder.color_side1_blk_std_pms.label.default: 1 Black, 1 Standard, and 1 Custom PMS Ink

adder.color_side1_blk_2pms.label.description: Label for 2 Custom PMS inks and 1 Black ink
adder.color_side1_blk_2pms.label.default: 2 Custom PMS Inks and 1 Black Ink

adder.color_side1_2std_pms.label.description: Label for 2 Standard inks and 1 Custom PMS ink
adder.color_side1_2std_pms.label.default: 2 Standard Inks and 1 Custom PMS Ink

adder.color_side1_std_2pms.label.description: Label for 2 Custom PMS inks and 1 Standard ink
adder.color_side1_std_2pms.label.default: 2 Custom PMS Inks and 1 Standard Ink

adder.color_side1_blk_3std.label.description: Label for 3 Standard inks and 1 Black ink

adder.color_side1_blk_2std_pms.label.description: Label for 2 Standard, 1 Black, and 1 Custom PMS ink
adder.color_side1_blk_2std_pms.label.default: 2 Standard Inks, 1 Black, and 1 Custom PMS Ink

adder.color_side1_blk_std_2pms.label.description: Label for 2 Custom PMS, 1 Black, and 1 Standard ink
adder.color_side1_blk_std_2pms.label.default: 2 Custom PMS Inks, 1 Black, and 1 Standard Ink

adder.color_side1_blk_3pms.label.description: Label for 3 Custom PMS inks and 1 Black ink
adder.color_side1_blk_3pms.label.default: 3 Custom PMS Inks and 1 Black Ink

adder.color_side1_3std_pms.label.description: Label for 3 Standard inks and 1 Custom PMS ink
adder.color_side1_3std_pms.label.default: 3 Standard Inks and 1 Custom PMS Ink

adder.color_side1_2std_2pms.label.description: Label for 2 Standard inks and 2 Custom PMS inks
adder.color_side1_2std_2pms.label.default: 2 Standard Inks and 2 Custom PMS Inks

adder.color_side1_std_3pms.label.description: Label for 3 Custom PMS inks and 1 Standard ink
adder.color_side1_std_3pms.label.default: 3 Custom PMS Inks and 1 Standard Ink

adder.color_side2_one_color.label.description: The ui label for one color printing on side two

adder.color_side2_two_color.label.description: The ui label for two color printing on side two

adder.color_side2_three_color.label.description: The ui label for three color printing on side two

adder.color_side2_four_color.label.description: The ui label for four color printing on side two

adder.color_side2_cmyk.label.description: The ui label for full color (CMYK) printing on side two

adder.varaddress_side1.label.description: The ui label for variable addressing on side one

adder.varaddress_side2.label.description: The ui label for variable addressing on side two
